dmca.title: Google Groups DMCA - Bradley Cowan
dmca.body:
FROM:	BRADLEY COWAN
P.O. Box 9756 San Diego, CA 92169 USA FAX (619) 276-6544
E-MAIL brad_cowan2002@yahoo.com
FAX TRANSMISSION
TO	Legal, DMCA complaints	COMPANY: Google, Inc
TOTAL PAGES: 1
INCLUDING THIS ONE
DATE:	January 15, 2007

Dear Sirs,

As outlined by the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, I am filing with you a notice of copyright infringement and providing the required information below to allow you to remove the infringing material.

I am the author and sole copyright owner of a set of books that have been illegally copied into PDF ebook format and are being sold/exchanged on your Google Groups.

Copyrighted work that has been infringed upon:
Four books authored by myself "Bradley F. Cowan" and titled:
1.Four-Dimensional Stock Market Structures and Cycles
2.Four-Dimensional Stock Market Structures and Cycles - Charts
3.Market Science - Volume I - Square of Twelve
4.Market Science - Volume II - Market Dynamics

Material that is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed above:

Message-ID: <f77777y.2kbezg@news.investmentbanter.com>

URL of infringing material: http://groups.google.nu:80/group/misc.invest.stocks/browse_thread/thread/12fd3464868fc920/9452355of4118a60?lnk=raot

Copyright owners contact information: Bradley F. Cowan
P.O. Box 9756
San Diego, CA 92169
brad_cowan2002@yahoo.com
(619) 276 1421

I, Bradley F. Cowan, have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf f the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
